content:
4伴保存七年
C2-62- 1841
June 14, 2
MEMORANDUM
TO
: Mr. R. L. Hirshberg Program Officer, U.S. AID/C
FROM
: C. C. Chang Original signed by Chief, Second Division C. C. Chang
SUBJECT : Excess Equipment
Reference is made to the attached documents about a Le Tourneau Scraper.
We have contacted THB who advised that for the construction work now undertaken, the said scraper was not required and therefore wished not to request the acquisition of the same.
Your original file is returned herewith.
Encl. cc: THE 2D
E-16.13.2
51. 3. 100×200
268
國史馆 Academia Historica
D
